isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - INSTRUMENTS (New Data Link Driven Instrument Cluster) - REMOVE AND INSTALL - PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARDS

svcsubproc.title: Replacement
svcsubproc.para: Since printed circuit boards are fastened to and integral with the instrument cluster body, the boards and cluster are available for replacement as a complete assembly only. Where replacement is required, obtain a new gaugeless instrument cluster assembly and transfer all gauges, warning light masks and light bulbs from old cluster body to the new.
